faq.title: Help Center
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about orders, shipping, returns, and more.

shippingTime.question: How long does shipping take?
shippingTime.answer: Most orders ship within 1-2 business days and arrive in 3-5 business days. Express shipping options are available at checkout.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. All payments are securely processed.

returns.question: Can I return or exchange an item?
returns.answer: Yes! We offer free returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unused and in original packaging. Visit our Returns Center to initiate a return.

tracking.question: How do I track my order?
tracking.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also check order status by logging into your account.

internationalShipping.question: Do you offer international shipping?
internationalShipping.answer: Yes, we ship to over 100 countries worldwide. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by destination.

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: Click 'Sign Up' in the top navigation. You can also create an account during checkout by selecting 'Save my information for next time'.

cta.title: Still need help?
cta.description: Our customer support team is available 24/7 to assist you with any questions.

hero.title: We are redefining the future of shopping
hero.subtitle: A passionate team dedicated to bringing you the best products with an exceptional experience

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded in 2010, we started as a small boutique with a big dream - to make premium products accessible to everyone.
story.p2: We believe shopping should be joyful, sustainable, and personal. Every product in our collection is carefully curated to meet our high standards.
story.p3: Today, we are proud to serve millions of customers worldwide while staying true to our original values.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These principles guide everything we do

customer.title: Customer Obsession
customer.desc: We start with the customer and work backwards.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.subtitle: The brilliant minds behind our success

cta.title: Join Our Community
cta.subtitle: Sign up for exclusive offers and updates.

newsletter.title: Join Our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to receive updates, access to exclusive deals, and more.

about.description: Your premier destination for fashion and style. We offer the latest trends at affordable prices.

footer.supportTitle: We are always ready to help you
footer.supportDesc: Contact us through any of the following support channels:

BecomeVendor.footerText: For any inquiries, please contact us at info@example.com

eligibility.title: 1. Return Eligibility
eligibility.content: At Sarah Alnomow in Jordan, we accept returns within 14 days of the original purchase date. Items must be unused, in original condition with all tags attached and packaging intact. Proof of purchase is required.

initiateReturn.title: 2. How to Initiate a Return
initiateReturn.content: To return an item to Sarah Alnomow, please email us at {email} with your order number and reason for return. We will provide return instructions specific to your location in Jordan.
initiateReturn.note: For returns in Amman, you may also visit our physical store with your original receipt.

shipping.title: 3. Return Shipping in Jordan

rows: Free returns at our Amman location
We arrange pickup for defective items (free)
Customer pays return shipping for change of mind

shipping.note: *Return shipping costs vary by location in Jordan. Contact us for exact fees.

refundProcess.title: 4. Refund Process
refundProcess.content: Sarah Alnomow processes refunds within 5 business days after receiving your return. Refunds are issued to the original payment method. Please allow 3-5 additional days for bank processing in Jordan.

exchanges.title: 5. Exchanges
exchanges.content: Sarah Alnomow offers size exchanges within Jordan when stock is available. Please contact us within 7 days of delivery to arrange an exchange.

damagedItems.title: 6. Damaged or Defective Items
damagedItems.content: If you receive a damaged item from Sarah Alnomow, please contact us immediately at {email} with photos of the damage. We will arrange a free return and replacement for items available in our Jordan warehouse.

international.title: 7. International Returns
international.content: For international customers returning to Jordan, you are responsible for return shipping costs and any customs fees. Sarah Alnomow cannot refund original shipping costs for international orders.

storeCredit.title: 8. Store Credit
storeCredit.content: Sarah Alnomow may issue store credit in JOD for returns that don't meet our policy requirements. This credit can be used for future purchases at our Jordan store or online.

contact.title: 9. Contact Sarah Alnomow
contact.shippingLink: For our shipping policy within Jordan, please see {link}.

processingTime.title: 1. Processing Time
processingTime.content: All orders are processed within a few business days after receiving your order confirmation. You will receive a notification when your order has shipped.

domesticShipping.title: 2. Domestic Shipping
domesticShipping.note: Delivery times are estimates and may vary depending on location and carrier.

internationalShipping.title: 3. International Shipping
internationalShipping.content: We offer international shipping to many countries. Delivery times vary by destination. Customers are responsible for any customs fees or import duties that may apply.

orderTracking.title: 4. Order Tracking
orderTracking.content: Once your order ships, you will receive tracking information via email. If you haven't received tracking details within a reasonable time, please contact us at {email}.

shippingRestrictions.title: 5. Shipping Restrictions
shippingRestrictions.content: Some items may have shipping restrictions due to size, weight, or content regulations. We cannot ship to PO boxes or certain restricted addresses.

delayedOrders.title: 6. Delayed Orders
delayedOrders.content: While we strive for timely delivery, occasional delays may occur due to unforeseen circumstances. We will notify you if your order experiences significant delays.

incorrectAddress.title: 7. Incorrect Shipping Address
incorrectAddress.content: Please verify your shipping address before submitting your order. We are not responsible for orders shipped to incorrect addresses provided by the customer.

lostPackages.title: 8. Lost or Stolen Packages
lostPackages.content: If your tracking shows delivered but you haven't received your package, please contact us within {days} days of the delivery date so we can investigate with the carrier.

returnsExchanges.title: 9. Returns & Exchanges
returnsExchanges.content: For information about returning or exchanging items, please see our {link}. Customers are responsible for return shipping costs unless the return is due to our error.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using our website (the "Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use this Service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: We provide an online platform for e-commerce services. The Service may change from time to time at our sole discretion.

responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: As a user, you agree to provide accurate registration information, maintain account confidentiality, and use the Service only for lawful purposes.

purchases.title: 4. Purchases and Payments
purchases.content: For purchases, you may need to provide payment information. You represent that you have the legal right to use your payment method and that your information is accurate.

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The Service and its original content are our exclusive property, protected by copyright and trademark laws. Our trademarks may not be used without prior written consent.

userContent.title: 6. User Content
userContent.content: You are responsible for any content you post through the Service. By posting content, you grant us the right to use, modify, and distribute such content.

prohibitedActivities.title: 7. Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.content: You agree not to use the Service for illegal purposes, harass others, upload malicious code, or attempt unauthorized access to our systems.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate your account and access to the Service immediately, without notice, for any reason including breach of these Terms.

liability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from your use of the Service or any content obtained from it.

governingLaw.title: 10. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of the applicable jurisdiction, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changes.title: 11. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms at any time. For material changes, we will provide notice before new terms take effect. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms:

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to our website. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have questions or concerns, please contact us at {email}. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or make purchases.

informationCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We collect personal information you voluntarily provide when registering, placing orders, subscribing to newsletters, or contacting us. This may include your name, email, phone number, shipping/billing address, and payment information.

informationUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content: We use collected information to process orders, communicate with you, provide customer support, improve our services, send marketing communications (if opted in), prevent fraud, and comply with legal obligations.

informationSharing.title: 4. Sharing Your Information
informationSharing.content: We may share information with service providers who perform services for us (payment processing, shipping, etc.). Information may also be shared during business transfers or when required by law to protect our rights.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to track website activity. You can refuse cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect your ability to use some site features.

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement security measures to protect your personal information. However, no Internet transmission or electronic storage method is 100% secure.

privacyRights.title: 7. Your Privacy Rights
privacyRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have rights regarding your personal information including access, correction, objection to processing, and withdrawal of consent. To exercise these rights, contact us at {email}.

childrenPrivacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 and will delete such information if discovered.

policyChanges.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of changes by posting the updated policy with a new "Last updated" date. Changes are effective when posted.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: For questions about this Privacy Policy:
